item.description:
This private steppers set should not be missed.

This will be your opportunity to Meet and Greet our guests of the Steady Steppers instructional team.

This set will "kick off" our Steppin' Workshop weekend, and promises to be a great time with lot's of steppin'.

Sign up and reserve your spots in the July 10th Workshops, before they sell out.


Cover: $10

Attire: Casual and Neat - Dress Shorts are acceptable - Boston is experiencing a heat wave

Grille 831 Executive Chef Team will provide light buffet

Music: DJ C-Smooth and our own DJ Bright Eyes

Great sound system, excellent, friction-free dance floor
Step to the sounds of R & B, Soul, Neo-Soul, Smooth Jazz, Hip-Hop, and the Classics!

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Meet & Greet the Steady Steppers - Steppers Set
